metadata.feature_description: Displays statistics about tag usage across community content with pagination support

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar > Dashboard > Community Analytics
steps.expected: Community Analytics dashboard loads with Tag Statistics visible in the Trending Tags section
steps.actual: Community Analytics panel fails to load - content area remains blank due to JavaScript error: TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function at dashboardClass.init (social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025:39)

issues: Critical JavaScript error prevents Community Analytics dashboard from loading: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function

test_scenarios.scenario_name: View tag statistics for different time periods

steps.action: Attempt to access Tag Statistics section to change time period
steps.expected: Should be able to select Day, Week, Month, Year, or Custom time periods to filter tag statistics
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: UI inaccessible due to JavaScript initialization error in Community Analytics module

steps.action: Attempt to access Trending Tags section and use pagination controls
steps.expected: Should be able to navigate through tag results using prev/next pagination buttons (6 items per page)
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: UI inaccessible due to JavaScript initialization error in Community Analytics module

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify tag count accuracy and display

steps.action: Attempt to view tag statistics horizontal bar chart
steps.expected: Tags should be displayed as a horizontal bar chart with usage counts
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: UI inaccessible due to JavaScript initialization error in Community Analytics module

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Test empty state when no tags exist

steps.action: Attempt to view tag statistics when no tags are present
steps.expected: Should display 'No Trending Tags' message when no tag data is available
steps.actual: Cannot test - Community Analytics panel fails to load due to JavaScript error

issues: UI inaccessible due to JavaScript initialization error in Community Analytics module

observations: Critical Bug: Community Analytics dashboard fails to initialize due to JavaScript error 'TypeError: utility.serializeCustomDate is not a function' at social-dashboard-combined-instance.js:1025:39
The utility.serializeCustomDate function is called in the dashboardClass.init method but appears to be undefined, suggesting a missing dependency or incorrect utility object initialization
Code review confirms tag statistics are displayed as a horizontal bar chart in the 'Trending Tags' section (social-dashboard.html lines 240-249)
Pagination is implemented with 6 items per page using prev/next buttons (social-dashboard-instance.js line 991)
Time period filtering supports Day, Week, Month, Year, and Custom date ranges (social-dashboard.html lines 17-29)
Code suggests 'Sort tags by usage count' is not a user-controllable UI feature - tags are returned pre-sorted by count from the GetTagStats API endpoint
Empty state handling exists in code: displays 'No Trending Tags' message when totalResults < 1 (social-dashboard-instance.js lines 858-860)
